question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding the Least Developed Countries Fund?
1) It was established in 2001.Â 
2) It is operated by the Global Environment Facility
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Least Developed Countries Fund (LDCF) was established in 2001 and is operated by the Global Environment Facility (GEF). It was established to support these countries work programme under the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC).
